Functions
GetCircleCircleDepth
public float GetCircleCircleDepth(
Circle circle1,
Circle circle2,
Vector2 speed,
Side collisionSide
)

Determines the depth of a circle1 inside circle2

Does not take the speed nor the collisionSide into account, the depth is calculated along the rays

Parameter
speed
Vector2

Speed of circle1 when it enters circle2
